verbs.description: German Chancellor Angela Merkel [V: is] heading to the White House for talks with President Donald Trump as she battles to save the Iran nuclear deal and to stop US tariffs on EU countries .

[ARG0: German Chancellor Angela Merkel] is [V: heading] [ARG1: to the White House] [ARGM-PRP: for talks with President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: as she battles to save the Iran nuclear deal and to stop US tariffs on EU countries] .

German Chancellor Angela Merkel is heading to the White House for talks with President Donald Trump as [ARG0: she] [V: battles] [ARG2: to save the Iran nuclear deal and to stop US tariffs on EU countries] .

German Chancellor Angela Merkel is heading to the White House for talks with President Donald Trump as [ARG0: she] battles to [V: save] [ARG1: the Iran nuclear deal] and to stop US tariffs on EU countries .

German Chancellor Angela Merkel is heading to the White House for talks with President Donald Trump as [ARG0: she] battles to save the Iran nuclear deal and to [V: stop] [ARG1: US tariffs on EU countries] .
